data.text: @AivarsTennisUK However, as all the entry requirements tend to change very often, we kindly ask you to double check this information closer to the departure date. More information: https://t.co/WARwn5dqcG

@AivarsTennisUK Hi! There is no obligation to do the test if a person has had COVID-19 and has been declared recovered by a doctor within six months before arrival, or if a person is fully vaccinated against COVID-19 and the course of vaccinations was finished no more than 12 months earlier.
@aviatorilisk We know - we listened! https://t.co/KBMEIDYoFX

data.text: @endaburke81 @manairport @Airbus Amazing shots! Greetings from sunny Riga!

@AdamWoodage Correct! The rules to entry Georgia remain the same. Travelers must have a vaccination certificate proving they have completed the full course of a COVID-19 vaccination. Negative test result is not required. Thank you.

@Summit1971 @mglonxp Hello! Please be informed that as of July 5 all passengers (including fully vaccinated ones) must have a negative Covid-19 PCR test result not older than 72 hours prior to arrival to Tbilisi. For more details we kindly invite you to contact the responsible authorities. Thank you.
When returning to our home base in Riga, we are always delighted to see the evergreen forests and meadows below. Have a great and sun-filled weekend! https://t.co/X1XEskln2E

@mglonxp Hi! If your vaccine has been administered in the EU/EEA/CH/UK and 14 days have passed since ending the full vaccination course, no test will be needed in your case.
For more details: https://t.co/3bGziMdKjA

Naples is a true gem for history lovers and also one of our newest destinations! ✈️ Filled with sunshine and historical sites, this city can truly create a perfect ambiance for your holidays. ☀️ Do you know how many castles are there in Naples? #airBalticQuiz

@MaarchaL Labdien! Pašreizējās krīzes apstākļos airBaltic regulāri pielāgo tās lidojumu grafiku atbilstoši mainīgajiem ceļojumu ierobežojumiem un pasažieru pieprasījumam. airBaltic pašlaik paredz lidojumus no Liepājas uz Rīgu atsākt šī gada septembrī.

#DidYouKnow that the two routes in our network, which cross the most country air spaces on standard circumstances, are Lisbon and Palma de Mallorca? It takes 10 country air spaces to reach these destinations from Riga. https://t.co/DIHP49FzAr

data.text: @AleFormi As we already confirmed to you with our accounting unit - refund has been fully done from our side. We kindly ask you to double check all the details once again. Thank you.

@MIgnatjevs Labdien! Vēl būtu nepieciešamas detaļas par Jūsu rezervāciju (rezervācijas numurs, utt.), bet savādāk - ja konkrētā valsts, uz kuru plānojiet ceļot neko papildus vairs neprasa, vairāk informācijas mums nebūs nepieciešams.
This was a week full of midsummer festivities here in Latvia! 🌿 In this #airBalticQuiz we would like to know - which one of the mentioned traditions and activities are your favourite?

@AleFormi Hello! We checked and see that our team has already provided all the information in regards to the refunds multiple times including ARN transaction numbers. For more details we kindly ask you to check with your bank. Thank you!

data.text:
To make the check-in and boarding process as smooth as possible, we offer to check your Covid-19 related travel documents already before your travel! 
👉 Send them to c19doc@airbaltic.com up to 24h before departure.
🔔 We will notify you once your documents are approved. https://t.co/5FWYekBnjH

It's the time of year when nature is at its fullest, when the meadows are in full bloom, and flora is said to possess magical powers. Let your soul become enchanted by midsummer magic! 🌿 https://t.co/3dVGmZ0cGb
@onyourownkid Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. Please know that in this case you’d be considered as a passenger traveling from The United States.

data.text:
@meekaale Hello! In a case where an infant turns 2 y.o. during a travel, we kindly advise our passengers to book two one-way flights. 

In the first one, you should indicate you’re traveling with an infant, however in a return reservation you should already book a child ticket.

Italy is often named as world's most desirable holiday destination. Recently we launched new flights to Italy's most soulful city Naples. Watch our first landing there and uncover what there is to explore in this beautiful Italian capital of south: https://t.co/ua00HYJTWp https://t.co/UoazUmOoI4

#DidYouKnow that the most popular destination for our passengers this Midsummer Solstice Holiday week is... drumroll 🥁... Milan?
Barcelona, Heraklion, Nice and Malaga are also among the most loved and demanded! https://t.co/vqqi6ZOhTk

urls.title: Travel regulations | airBaltic
urls.description: Your guide to getting the right information about travel documentation and up-to-date travel requirements.

data.text: @likhithbc Hello! Could you please clarify on your question? Do you mean current entry requirements? If so, then we would like to inform that they are set by the countries individually and not the airlines. For more details please check: https://t.co/pPFt9maukj

Thanks for voting! We’re excited to announce that 41% of you voted for the Latvian livery! 🇱🇻 
However, we are proud of all of our beauties. 😍 https://t.co/yCD3Q3VQ12
@tuksgaita Taču saprotam apjukumu. Vēlreiz nodosim informāciju visām mūsu komandām. Paldies par sapratni.

@tuksgaita Pēc Latvijas šī brīža ieceļošanas noteikumiem, pasažierim ir jābūt izietam pilnam vakcinācijas kursam un pēc pēdējās devas saņemšanas pagājušām pilnām 14 diennaktīm. Pretējā gadījumā var būt nepieciešams PCR tests (72h pirms lidojuma), vai Antigen tests (24h pirms lidojuma).

@tuksgaita Labrīt! Kā jau atbildējām iepriekš, valstu ieceļošanas noteikumi šobrīd mainās ļoti strauji - dažkārt pat pa stundām. Visam sekojam līdzi, taču visus pasažierus vienmēr īsi pirms izlidošanas aicinām tos pārbaudīt vēlreiz sazinoties ar konkrēto valstu atbildīgajiem dienestiem.

urls.description: Your guide to getting the right information about travel documentation and up-to-date travel requirements.

data.text: @L45064250 Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. According to the eased entry restrictions, PCR test in your case is not mandatory when entering Latvia. For more details, please visit: https://t.co/pPFt9maukj

@beacia001 Kā norādīts video, var uzrādīt kā negatīvu, tā antigen testu. Aicinām aplūkot arī valstu sarakstu, uz kurām ir attiecināmi īpašie piesardzības un
ierobežojošie pasākumi (attiecināms uz nedēļu no 18. jūnija): https://t.co/yHHzhk3Yak

Beautiful day here in Riga and it’s time for #airBalticQuiz! ☀️ How about some healthy competition between our three special livery aircraft? Which one has stolen your heart and is your personal favourite? ✈️
@yhaskell Please DM us privately your booking reference number and we will check. Thank you!

@yhaskell Hello! Thank you for the question. Please be informed that currently we don't have a dedicated airBaltic app (however have one for airBaltic Club), but can confirm that mobile boarding pass still can be added to Passbook/Wallet app when registering for the flight.

@DaigaLin07 Paldies par precizējumu. Lidojot uz Latviju, vakcinētas personas var uzrādīt ES digitālās vakcinācijas sertifikātu vai jebkuru citu sertifikātu, kas izsniegts ES, EEZ, Šveicē vai Lielbritānijā.

data.text: The usually high travel season is finally here! ✈️ We understand its slightly different this year, therefore we have gathered all the key elements for your safe and comfortable travels. Remember that all the details can also be found here: https://t.co/lOB7mx3wiZ https://t.co/RO8ewdEtAu

Vasara un ceļošanas laiks ir klāt! ✈️ 
Nelielā video esam apkopojuši visu svarīgāko, kas pasažieriem jāievēro, lai ceļojums būtu ērts un komfortabls. Tāpat aktuālo informāciju vienmēr iegūsiet šeit: https://t.co/hHLWc1sXij https://t.co/ZqlRD0Q1fg

@serene_euphoria @ArnoldsBite @Sat_Min Par sīkākām detaļām saistībā ar valstu sarakstu lūdzam Jūs sazināties ar SPKC. 
Drošības pasākumi un ieceļošanas prasības (vai tests nepieciešams konkrētajā situācijā vakcinētam/nevakcinētam cilvēkam, utt.) redzams augstākminētajā @Sat_Min tvītā! Paldies!
@lieneplastika @SPKCentrs @Sat_Min Tabulā šis ir skaidri atzīmēts ar "Tests pirms ceļojuma" (tātad lidojuma) un "Tests iebraucot Latvijā" (pēc lidojuma veikšanas, piemēram, jau lidostā).

data.text: @lieneplastika @SPKCentrs @Sat_Min Labdien! Kā jau redzams tabulā, nevakcinētiem pasažieriem visos gadījumos ir jāuzrāda negatīvs Covid-19 tests (PCR 72h, vai Antigen 24h) pirms reisa izlidošanas laika.
@Glider For all the details we kindly invite you to check this with the local country authorities. Thank you!

@Glider Hello! There are many variables for this (such as are you vaccinated, is the country from whom you are arriving a red country if you are not vaccinated which would mean you would need to self-isolate if entering Latvia etc.).

@Eduards Labdien! Valstu ieceļošanas noteikumi šobrīd mainās ļoti bieži un strauji, tāpēc aicinām Jūs tos pārbaudīt mūsu mājaslapā īsi pirms Jūsu plānotā lidojuma, vai sazinoties ar konkrētās valsts iestādēm.
https://t.co/ZdjGUrciej

@revis04394698 @LigaBergmane @Arlietas @EM_gov_lv @veselibasmin @IeM_gov_lv @Valsts_policija @Sat_Min @SPKCentrs @SUSTENTO1 @PTACgovLV @riga_airport Valstu ieceļošanas noteikumi šobrīd mainās ļoti bieži un strauji, tāpēc informāciju e-pastos varam arī nepaspēt nomainīt. Atvainojamies par to un nodosim kolēģiem!

@revis04394698 @LigaBergmane @Arlietas @EM_gov_lv @veselibasmin @IeM_gov_lv @Valsts_policija @Sat_Min @SPKCentrs @SUSTENTO1 @PTACgovLV @riga_airport Labdien! RT @Sat_Min: ✈️No 16. jūnija tiek atcelts nebūtisku ceļojumu aizliegums, prasība veikt #COVID19 testu un doties pašizolācijā, ieceļojot Lat…

@saldaanebuus @LigaBergmane @Arlietas @EM_gov_lv @veselibasmin @IeM_gov_lv @Valsts_policija @Sat_Min @SPKCentrs @SUSTENTO1 @PTACgovLV @riga_airport Sveiki! Šobrīd nekas ieceļošanas noteikumos vēl nav mainījies.

urls.title: Frequently asked question about airBaltic
urls.description: We're here to help you! Helpful answers to your questions and useful contacts to find out everything you need about your flight.

data.text:
@CharlieFagg28 We kindly invite you to contact our Reservations department for further assistance as well as rerouting options: https://t.co/UWa844vRzD
Thank you!

@CharlieFagg28 Thank you! Due to fog and low visibility in Amsterdam airport area this morning unfortunately there were some disruptions in our flight schedule to/from Amsterdam this morning. Passenger safety is and always will be our top priority. Once again, apologies for inconveniences.
@CharlieFagg28 Hello and apologies for such situation as well as inconveniences caused. Was your flight today to/from Amsterdam?

Have you ever been in Verona? Maybe you have been lucky enough to attend one of the city’s most famous event – The Arena Opera Festival? 🎶 In this #airBalticQuiz we would like to test your history knowledge. Do you know the year when this event was founded? 😊

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text: @chloregy @lufthansa @KLM Hi! These requirements do depend on your flight route (as countries in which you are connecting may ask for a test etc). As for Spain, you must have a negative Covid-19 PCR or antigen test result not older than 48 hours prior to arrival or certificate of vaccination or recovery.

During May 2021, we have carried 67 300 passengers or 37% more than the previous month. We are happy to see an increased interest from passengers for flights to destinations in Mediterranean as the epidemiological situation improves. Read more: https://t.co/5LvdDIL0Wb https://t.co/vIHFjmWlG2

data.text: @SneaksterYT Hello! Please be informed that children who are 14 years old, can travel alone, if they hold a passport (or for some destinations national ID card). Book 💻 09.06.-16.06.2021.
Travel ✈️ 20.06.- 31.10.2021. https://t.co/DLIQSA8K2h
@awakeagnese Labdien! Informējam, ka minētais apliecinājums https://t.co/cqgpKUFmRq ir jāaizpilda 48 stundu laikā pirms Latvijas Republikas robežas šķērsošanas. Paldies.
@phronemophobe Šādu specifisku jautājumu noskaidrošanai aicinām sazināties ar attiecīgās valsts atbildīgajām iestādēm. Paldies!

@RobertsTautvids Varam atkārtot mūsu iepriekšējo atbildi. Atbildīgo institūciju nākotnes lēmumus komentēt no savas puses diemžēl nevarēsim. Acinām rūpīgi sekot līdzi jaunumiem, kā arī sazināties ar minētajām valsts institūcijām. Pateicamies par sapratni.

data.text:
@RobertsTautvids Labdien! Diemžēl nevarēsim komentēt nākotnes lēmumus saistībā ar noteikumiem ceļošanai uz Zviedriju. Tos nosaka attiecīgās valsts insitūcijas, ne aviokompānija. Aicinām sekot līdzi aktuālajai informācijai mūsu mājas lapā: https://t.co/qHFIBt3sEn
Paldies!

data.text: Watch our @Airbus A220 landing from the first Riga – Santorini flight, and enjoy the iconic panorama view of the island's crystal blue waters and charming white houses. Add Santorini to your travel bucket list as Greece is open to travelers this summer: https://t.co/sLZEYVhgqK https://t.co/rvBlROCTVc

5. jūnijā uzsākām regulāros lidojumus jaunā maršrutā starp Rīgu un Santorini Grieķijā. Esam priecīgi novērot pieaugošu pasažieru interesi par lidojumiem uz Vidusjūras reģionu un turpināsim piedāvāt drošus un uzticamus pakalpojumus arī turpmāk! https://t.co/h3B6O0uXjA https://t.co/Q10nhhXbpK

urls.title: airBaltic City Collection - Collection
urls.description: airBaltic – the flag carrier of Latvia, in honour of Latvia’s centenary, in 2018, invited everyone to vote on their favourite towns and cities in Latvia, after which the company’s Airbus A220-300 fleet was named. Starting with Kuldiga, these cities will now one by one be represented on the digital art pieces issued by airBaltic. airBaltic’s jet fleet is the youngest in the Europe, consisting solely of the brand new Airbus A220-300.

data.text:
Hurray! 46% of you got the answer right. Kuldiga and Cesis are the current NFTs issued by us. 😉
You can check and purchase them on @opensea marketplace here: https://t.co/OjWPatzBRL
Can you guess which city will be the next one? 🤗
